verses.verse: And it came to pass the same year <S%H8141><s%>, in the beginning <S%H7225><s%> of the reign <S%H4467><s%> of Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, in the fourth <S%H7243><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>, and in the fifth <S%H2549><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, that Hananiah <S%H2608><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azur <S%H5809><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%>, which was of Gibeon <S%H1391><s%>, spoke <S%H559><s%> unto me in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, in the presence <S%H5869><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> and of all the people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Thus speaks <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, I have broken <S%H7665><s%> the yoke <S%H5923><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>.

Inside two full <S%H3117><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> will I bring again <S%H7725><s%> into this place <S%H4725><s%> all the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>, that Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> took away <S%H3947><s%> from this place <S%H4725><s%>, and carried <S%H935><s%> them to Babylon <S%H894><s%>:

And I will bring again <S%H7725><s%> to this place <S%H4725><s%> Jeconiah <S%H3204><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehoiakim <S%H3079><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, with all the captives <S%H1546><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, that went <S%H935><s%> into Babylon <S%H894><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: for I will break <S%H7665><s%> the yoke <S%H5923><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>.

Then the prophet <S%H5030><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the prophet <S%H5030><s%> Hananiah <S%H2608><s%> in the presence <S%H5869><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%>, and in the presence <S%H5869><s%> of all the people <S%H5971><s%> that stood <S%H5975><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>,

Even the prophet <S%H5030><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Amen <S%H543><s%>: the Lord <S%H3068><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3068><s%>: the Lord perform <S%H6965><s%> your words <S%H1697><s%> which you have prophesied <S%H5012><s%>, to bring again <S%H7725><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>, and all that is carried away captive <S%H1473><s%>, from Babylon <S%H894><s%> into this place <S%H4725><s%>.
Nevertheless hear <S%H8085><s%> you now this word <S%H1697><s%> that I speak <S%H1696><s%> in your ears <S%H241><s%>, and in the ears <S%H241><s%> of all the people <S%H5971><s%>;

The prophets <S%H5030><s%> that have been before <S%H6440><s%> me and before <S%H6440><s%> you of old <S%H5769><s%> prophesied <S%H5012><s%> both against many <S%H7227><s%> countries <S%H776><s%>, and against great <S%H1419><s%> kingdoms <S%H4467><s%>, of war <S%H4421><s%>, and of evil <S%H7451><s%>, and of pestilence <S%H1698><s%>.

The prophet <S%H5030><s%> which prophesies <S%H5012><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%>, when the word <S%H1697><s%> of the prophet <S%H5030><s%> shall come to pass <S%H935><s%>, then <S%H227><s%> shall the prophet <S%H5030><s%> be known <S%H3045><s%>, that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has truly <S%H571><s%> sent him <S%H7971><s%>.

Then Hananiah <S%H2608><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the yoke <S%H4133><s%> from off the prophet <S%H5030><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>'s neck <S%H6677><s%>, and broke it <S%H7665><s%>.

And Hananiah <S%H2608><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> in the presence <S%H5869><s%> of all the people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; Even so will I break <S%H7665><s%> the yoke <S%H5923><s%> of Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> from the neck <S%H6677><s%> of all nations <S%H1471><s%> inside the space of two full <S%H3117><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>. And the prophet <S%H5030><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> his way <S%H1870><s%>.

Then the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came unto Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the prophet <S%H310><s%>, after that Hananiah <S%H2608><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> had broken <S%H7665><s%> the yoke <S%H4133><s%> from off the neck <S%H6677><s%> of the prophet <S%H5030><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Go <S%H1980><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> Hananiah <S%H2608><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; You have broken <S%H7665><s%> the yokes <S%H4133><s%> of wood <S%H6086><s%>; but you shall make <S%H6213><s%> for them yokes <S%H4133><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%>.

For thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; I have put <S%H5414><s%> a yoke <S%H5923><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%> upon the neck <S%H6677><s%> of all these nations <S%H1471><s%>, that they may serve <S%H5647><s%> Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>; and they shall serve <S%H5647><s%> him <S%H5414><s%>: and I have given him the animals <S%H2416><s%> of the field also <S%H7704><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> unto Hananiah <S%H2608><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%>, Hear <S%H8085><s%> now <S%H2608><s%>, Hananiah; The Lord <S%H3068><s%> has not sent <S%H7971><s%> you <S%H5971><s%>; but you make this people to trust <S%H982><s%> in a lie <S%H8267><s%>.

Therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; Behold <S%H7971><s%>, I will cast you from off the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%>: this year <S%H8141><s%> you shall die <S%H4191><s%>, because you have taught <S%H1696><s%> rebellion <S%H5627><s%> against the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
So Hananiah <S%H2608><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> the same year <S%H8141><s%> in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>.
